segments.text: Hi , Bill.It ' s Marsha Black at MPPD Ltd.How are you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hello , Marsha . I'm great and you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not too bad at all.Do you have a minute ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what can I do for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We're ready to place our Christmas order and we need a formal bid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: So this is a real thing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , this is not a drill . This is for all the marbles .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , who am I bidding against ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The usual guys , so you better use a sharp pencil .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Okay , give me a week and I'll have time to get my pencil real sharp . I should have some new figures from Malaysia by then .
segments.speaker: S2
